availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Colier (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from August 4, 1862 to May 29, 1863 and major from May 29, 1863 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, Division 1, p. 226A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, p. 89.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 198-199.
